english.segment1: We're ordinary people. Close but not the worst. But I think you know. Were all the lonely people. Alone but not at first?. But I think you know
english.segment2: The older living people. Who've been through even worse. But I think you know. Just like the other people. Alone but not at first. But I think you know
english.segment3: Sometimes we don't have a life
english.segment4: We're ordinary people. Close but not the worst. But I think you know. Were all the lonely people. Alone but not at first?. But I think you know
english.segment5: Sometimes we don't have a life.
